ComicInfo.Title: The Giant From the Tomb; Death Flower; The Final Horror
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Giant From the Tomb: In a small city-state in central Europe, Dr. Weir has to contend with the evil dictator Horak and the undead giant Golga.
Death Flower: The Purple Claw encounters a creepy old man that turns into a huge "Death Flower" at night that lives in the Florida swamps and feasts on human flesh.
The Final Horror: Alcoholic scientist Bill Bartel enters a horrible dream world every night. Dr. Weir uses the Purple Claw to enter that dream world. He gets Bartel to fight the final horror - an incarnation of the evil side of Bartel.
